mapper.insert: insert into member(MEMB_ID, MEMB_NAME, MEMB_PW, MEMB_ADDR, MEMB_PHONE_NUMBER, MEMB_EMAIL, MEMB_BIRTH, MEMB_GENDER, MEMB_JOIN_DATE, MEMB_CONFIRM, POST_NUMBER, DETAIL_ADDR) values(#{membId},#{membName},#{membPw},#{membAddr},#{membPhoneNumber},#{membEmail},#{membBirth}, #{membGender},sysdate,#{membConfirm},#{postNumber},#{detailAddr})
mapper.select: select MEMB_ID membId, MEMB_NAME membName, MEMB_PW membPw, MEMB_ADDR membAddr, MEMB_PHONE_NUMBER membPhoneNumber, MEMB_EMAIL membEmail, MEMB_BIRTH membBirth, MEMB_GENDER membGender, MEMB_JOIN_DATE membJoinDate, MEMB_CONFIRM membConfirm, POST_NUMBER postNumber, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr from member
